channel.title: RST - runescapetrades Hacked
channel.description:
Someone is coming onto there forums and is randomly hacking accounts and msn and the site is hacked
i believe it was a guy called "shad0w"
he hacked "meurs" msn asking me to sell him mills i told him a secret word to tell me whenever it was the real meur the word was poodles the hacker failed ;0 heres the convo:
-=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!!! fast says: sell me mills Someone hacked RST says: FFS say the word if your really meur Someone hacked RST says: go on. Someone hacked RST says: say it Someone hacked RST says: i dare you 0_0 -=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!!! fast says: runescapetrades Someone hacked RST says: .. Someone hacked RST says: Anyways, how did you manage to hack meurs msn account? -=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!!! fast says: wtf -=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!!! fast says: im meur fool Someone hacked RST says: then why wont you say the word eh -=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!!! fast says: u want the site bak Someone hacked RST says: yes. -=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!!! fast says: u wana pay for it Someone hacked RST says: rofl so you aren't meur -=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!!! fast says: no shit duder bran -=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!!! fast says: brain Someone hacked RST says: who are you then? Someone hacked RST says: isellpins? Someone hacked RST says: shad0w?
mm its wierd :(

Someone is coming onto there forums and is randomly hacking accounts and msn and the site is hacked

i believe it was a guy called “shad0w”

he hacked “meurs” msn asking me to sell him mills

FFS say the word if your really meur

runescapetrades

…

Anyways, how did you manage to hack meurs msn account?

wtf

im meur fool

then why wont you say the word eh

u want the site bak

yes.
-=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!! fast says:
u wana pay for it

rofl so you aren’t meur

no shit duder bran
-=[Armed & Dangerous]=-Buying mills $13usd each!!! fast says:

who are you then?
